thread.section_title: FlightNetwork.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FlightNetwork.com | www.flightnetwork.com
thread.title: Patricia A Cosgrove
thread.title_full: FlightNetwork.com reviewed by Patricia A Cosgrove

author: Patricia A Cosgrove
title: Patricia A Cosgrove
text:
And it didn't cost me anything. Thanks for your help!!!!
booked my flight on 2/26/2017 over the phone.
My flight is supposed to be tomorrow 3/9/2017. However - just dug out my ticket to call and confirm. The flight was booked for 2/9/17 - 2/14/17.
How can this be I am on hold right now trying to get my flight out tomorrow. On top of that, I may have to pay because they don't know if it is my fault or theirs???? Ridiculous. How can a past flight even be booked at all on the computer? They are supposed to let me know how much it will cost me. WHOA.
